replies.body: I'm a fan, first top laner to get a Victorious skin. Plus I'm intending to start maining Tree once this ranked season is over :D I can understand that some people aren't keen on it though as tanks aren't always the huge play-makers/carries that other champs can be.

> [{quoted}](name=Glow,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=zZo3aBz9,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-10-04T02:20:45.193+0000)
>
> I'm a fan, first top laner to get a Victorious skin. Plus I'm intending to start maining Tree once this ranked season is over :D I can understand that some people aren't keen on it though as tanks aren't always the huge play-makers/carries that other champs can be.

Mao is a jungler. J4 has the toplane Victorious skin.
As of late he's [primarily a top laner](http://puu.sh/rzWyX/c169e3e0f3.jpg), and Jarvan has seen more action in the jungle. I think they're both both :p

> [{quoted}](name=Glow,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=zZo3aBz9,comment-id=000300010000,timestamp=2016-10-06T19:10:24.327+0000)
>
> As of late he's [primarily a top laner](http://puu.sh/rzWyX/c169e3e0f3.jpg), and Jarvan has seen more action in the jungle. I think they're both both :p

When J4 got his skin, he was the toplaner. That's what I meant. It essentially means that Mao is the jungler comp of the team.

yeah i get you.. i loved playing his Sup hes just too mana hungry tho..

Would've preferred someone else like maybe Braum (my fave champ thats why) or someone who is used quite abit .. the Sivir one last year was shocking

Braum would be really cool, I reckon Ekko would've been an appropriate choice for either year tbh. Sivir was definitely surprising last year - I guess with so many champs to choose from there's a high chance it won't be what people expected.
First good Victorious skin we've had.

> [{quoted}](name=SkarSkarSkarner,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=zZo3aBz9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-04T01:30:15.327+0000)
>
> First good Victorious skin we've had.

Janna and J4 are actually decent.
disagree i loved J4 Season 1 .. wished i played during then

even though I'm regularly content with being bronze 5 (or at least that's my skill level but for some reason I'm a bit above that and busy falling through various ranks atm), looking at this skin makes me kind of jealous and makes me wish I didn't have uni exams coming up to focus on so I could really try to climb to get the skin but oh well.

> [{quoted}](name=Nightjar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=zZo3aBz9,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-10-05T07:49:54.053+0000)
>
> even though I'm regularly content with being bronze 5 (or at least that's my skill level but for some reason I'm a bit above that and busy falling through various ranks atm), looking at this skin makes me kind of jealous and makes me wish I didn't have uni exams coming up to focus on so I could really try to climb to get the skin but oh well.

you got 30 days :3

haha with my skill level even just staying mid silver is going to a hard ask. Nah I don't think I can ever even consider getting high silver, not even thinking of gold. I'm sure I could ask one of my plat friends to boost me a bit but I despise boosting, so I'll just see whether I end up bronze or silver.
free champ and skin for me so yeah ill take it
pretty dissapointed its my 1st one and i was hoping it was a mids turn morg doesnt count
They might as well make it the new Snowdown skin because he's gonna look like a fucking Christmas tree.
